step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder and elbow movements are quite good. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in this position.
Good job stretching your arms overhead. Focus on keeping your wrists more aligned with your forearms as you extend.
Excellent work making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Keep your wrists as straight as possible during this squeeze.
You're doing well stretching your arms back. Pay attention to keeping your wrists straight and aligned with your arms.
Your shoulder and elbow movements are good. For the next repetitions, try to keep your wrists straighter when you make a fist and push down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straight and aligned with your arms throughout the movement, especially when making a fist and pushing down.
